page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT_KINNERTON/EVENJOB
page.content: IN KINNERTON & EVENJOBB THERE ARE MANY PEOPLE EMPLOYED IN AGRICULTURE ON FAMILY FARMS,ON A FULL OR PART TIME BASIS.UNEMPLOYMENT IS NOT A SERIOUS PROBLEM,MOST SCHOOL LEAVERS ARE FINDING SITUATIONS,HELPED BY THE YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME.MANY GO INTO CATERING, HAIRDRESSING, BUSINESS & SECRETARIAL WORK & THE BUILDING INDUSTRY.THE FORESTRY COMMISSION,COUNTY HIGHWAYS & MAINTAINANCE DEPT.& THE 2 LOCAL QUARRIES EMPLOY SOME RESIDENTS.A FEW PEOPLE TRAVEL TO KNIGHTON,PRESTEIGNE,& KINGTON & ARE EMPLOYED IN FACTORIES, SHOPS & THE LAUNDRY.RESIDENT IN THE AREA THERE ARE A SILVERSMITH,SEVERAL SCHOOLTEACHERS,A PHOTOGRAPER,2 BOOK SHOP OWNERS,AN ANTIQUE FURNITURE RESTORER,A VIOLIN MAKER,AN ESTATE AGENT,2 JOBBING BUILDERS,LECTURES, A BUILDING RESTORATION SPECIALIST,AN ARTIST,BUSINESS MEN & LORRY DRIVERS.
